2. Incubate for 5 minutes at room temperature for 5 minutes.
Centrifuge for 1 minute at 13,000 rpm at room temperature.
See that the liquid has all flowed through; if not,
Centrifuge for 1 minute at 13,000 rpm at room temperature.
